title: Beetroot & onion seed soup
ingredients: 1 tsp onion seeds (nigella), plus extra to serve
instructions: Tip the beetroot, lentils, apple, garlic and onion seeds into a blender with the vegetable stock and some seasoning, and blitz until smooth. Heat until piping hot in the microwave or on the hob, then scatter over some extra onion seeds, if you like.
